reviews.review_msg: Possibly one of the most personable, intelligent professors at SFU.  A fair marker; lots of assignments to do; lectures are highly intellectual but he dose not show off, but instead tries to get you to understand; although he is friendly and kind, he is not very hot like someone else pointed out.

Great professor. Genuinely a nice guy. Very approachable. Wants everyone in his class to do well and is always available for extra help. Pretty fair marker too. Lectures tend to jump all over the place, so be prepared to pay close attention.
